long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension saves guitar tabs while you browse ultimate-guitar.com so you can view them later.

Create your own little collection of guitar tabs and chords to learn more songs!

New in version 0.4.0
* Easily search for new tabs using the new search bar 
* Customize the font size when viewing your tabs

New in version 0.3.0
* Multi column layout for tabs

New in version 0.2.0
* You can now export/import your tabs
